name: ElderMael
tagline: Code Necromancer, Hardware Trickster, Angry Dev. Video Game Aficionado, Software Engineer.
body:
Hi, my name is Miguel Angel Enriquez Lopez.

I am a mexican software engineer based in Dallas/Austin, TX.

I write code for the JVM using Java, Ceylon and Scala. I also use JavaScript, CoffeScript and Ruby from time to time.

You can also find me in [Twitter](https://twitter.com/eldermael), [Medium](https://medium.com/@eldermael/) and I have a [Stackoverflow](http://stackoverflow.com/users/1391333/eldermael) profile.

In my free time I learn new programming languages, study big data analytics, tinker with computers and play video games.

![Me](http://www.gravatar.com/avatar/75aa3a4684b57c662ecba2ba89118de6?s=200)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
